item.title: The Hidden Cost of 'Retry Everything': How Naive Retry Logic Creates a Self-Inflicted DDoS
item.description: Retries are load, not safety. Without exponential backoff and jitter, your retry logic doesn’t protect against outages, it causes them. This post covers the mechanics of retry storms, five anti-patterns found in real production code, and what correct retry design actually looks like across layered Azure architectures.
